value:
If you come to me searching, say so.
I will not turn away one who seeks
their salvation.

It was the goddess who brought
peace to Fódlan. I merely carry
out her will.

Rest for a while, won't you? Do not
worry over your enemies for now.
While I'm here, there is no threat.

The goddess watches over us always.
Now, let us pray together...

Hm? Oh, I was...just thinking of my
mother. She was kinder and stronger
than any I've ever known.$k$pI have faith I will see her again.
One day.

I come bearing friendship and good
will from $Nf.

A power that lay dormant has
now awoken...
This is not enough. Not yet.
An unfortunate result.

You wish to grant me new power?
I understand, and I accept.

I am Seiros. My duty is to guide the
lost toward the will of the goddess.

Your kind are frail, ignorant creatures,
incapable of accomplishing anything
without the guidance of the goddess.$k$p...Or so I had thought. But I have been
forced to realize, meeting the Heroes
here, that I was wrong.$k$pYou in particular stand apart
as well... You are different from
the rest. Special in some way.$k$pMy instincts are not often wrong...$k$pIf you continue to fight for this world,
I will fight by your side, as a warrior.
As an equal.$k$pAnd I know the goddess will
be watching over you as well.
はいっ！
はああっ！
ううっ
まだです……！
You must be purified!
It is your time!
You have been judged.
In the name of the goddess.
How can this be?
Hmm.
Do not be afraid. You may speak openly with me.
What are you doing? Do you require my assistance?
Do the teachings of the Church of Seiros hold interest for you?
If you humbly devote yourself to prayer, even you may receive the blessing of the goddess.
If something precious is stolen from you, you must do whatever it takes to recover it.
Mother... I wish I could see you again, just once more...
I shall never abandon you. Even if it means staining my hands with blood…
Certainly.
Is that so?
We may go.
